articles.title: Russia's War in Ukraine Latest News Updates: May 4, 2023 - Bloomberg
articles.description: The European Union is considering ways to target third countries seen as doing too little to stop Russia evade sanctions, particularly those that can’t explain spikes in trade of key goods or technologies, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Europeans drain billions from banks, fed up with shrinking savings - Reuters
articles.description: European savers are pulling more of their money from banks, looking for a better deal as lenders resist paying up to hold on to deposits some feel they can currently live without.
